description: Represents a single version of a cookbook.

$eref.description: A list of files in a cookbook

___name.description: The name of the file, not including any subdirectories.

___specificity.description: The specificity of the file (the second part of the path). Only relevant to files and templates.

___url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded. If not specified on PUT, the server will assume the file is at the location specified by the sandboxes endpoint.

___checksum.description: The SHA256 checksum of the file.

___path.description: The path to the file, relative to the cookbook.

___attributes.description: Files in the cookbook under the attributes/ subdirectory.

$eref.description: A list of files in a cookbook

___name.description: The name of the file, not including any subdirectories.

___specificity.description: The specificity of the file (the second part of the path). Only relevant to files and templates.

___url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded. If not specified on PUT, the server will assume the file is at the location specified by the sandboxes endpoint.

___checksum.description: The SHA256 checksum of the file.

___path.description: The path to the file, relative to the cookbook.

___resources.description: Files in the cookbook under the resources/ subdirectory.

___long_description.description: A long description of the cookbook.

___source_url.description: The URL to the source code for this cookbook.

___dependencies.description: Cookbooks this cookbook depends on. Will be included automatically in the run list of nodes that include this cookbook.

___conflicting.description: Cookbooks that will conflict with this cookbook.

___issues_url.description: The URL to the bug tracker for this cookbook.

___description.description: A short description of the cookbook.

___maintainer.description: The cookbook maintainer's name or alias.

___providing.description: Recipes, resources and definitions provided by this cookbook. TODO this looks like a cookbook version constraint list; perhaps needs some love.

___platforms.description: The platforms (and versions) on which the cookbook runs.

___recommendations.description: Cookbooks that you should probably load with this cookbook (may not work without them).

___privacy.description: Whether this cookbook is private or not.

___suggestions.description: Cookbooks that you might want to load with this cookbook, but are optional.
